author: "Mari Herbst and Abigail Sanford"

output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

# Attach Packages

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

# Read in the Data
```{r}
ucsb_grad <- read.csv(here("data", "ucsb_grad_data.csv"))
```

# Create gglot
```{r}
ggplot(data = ucsb_grad, aes(x = year_abbr, y = domestic_enrollment, fill = ethnicity)) +
  geom_col(position = "fill") + 
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Domestic Enrollment", title = "Domestic Enrollment per Year based on Ethnicity")
```
